<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>The property 'glide.ui.polaris.ais_ready' should be present only in the 'AI Search For Next Experience'. If it exists in any other scopes (like Global) from an earlier version, this fix script will delete that record so that the property can be created in the correct scope.</description>
        <name>Delete AisReady Property in Global Scope</name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var AIS_NEXT_EXP_SCOPE_ID = '3c467b5f0bf130109e0fa4e6e9c4c946';
var AIS_READY_PROPERTY_NAME = 'glide.ui.polaris.ais_ready';

var propGr = new GlideRecord('sys_properties');
propGr.addQuery('name', AIS_READY_PROPERTY_NAME);
propGr.addQuery('sys_scope', '!=', AIS_NEXT_EXP_SCOPE_ID);
propGr.query();
if (propGr.next()) {
	gs.info('Deleting property ' + AIS_READY_PROPERTY_NAME + ' in scope ' + propGr.sys_scope.name);
	propGr.deleteRecord();
} else
	gs.info('Property ' + AIS_READY_PROPERTY_NAME + ' does not exist in non-AI Search For Next Experience scopes');
]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2022-10-13 03:04:47</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>a72a58c943a211102a4df03a5ab8f24c</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Delete AisReady Property in Global Scope</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Text Search API" source="com.glide.search">c93878203cf1311068bcf327dfe37f61</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_a72a58c943a211102a4df03a5ab8f24c</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2022-10-13 03:06:43</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
